article: `` it 's his patriotism that 's been terribly misunderstood , '' danny seeger says of his father , folk singer pete seeger , whose long and eventful life is recounted in jim brown 's unk , music-filled biographical film , `` pete seeger : the power of song , '' presented wednesday night as part of the pbs series `` american masters .
